articles.description: New Orleans Saints’ Taysom Hill is in rare company with Chicago Bears legend Walter Payton, according to the NFL Media Research Department
articles.content: Former BYU Cougars quarterback Taysom Hills four-touchdown performance last Sunday for the New Orleans Saints certainly turned heads around the NFL, and it also landed him in elite company with one o… [+806 chars]
